screenshot.description: Double tap on any home screens to activate iSnake mode then swipe to control your snake. Enjoy (^_^)

changelog.change: Make iSnake more cute by decreasing app icon size and allow you have more space for iSnake to hunting food ^_^.
Now you can double tap again while playing iSnake to stop the game.
